item.title: Traditionally, US presidents serving a second term - such as Donald Trump - are not offered a state visit. Instead, they are invited for tea or lunch with the monarch, as happened with former presidents Barack Obama and George W Bush. #DonaldTrump #KingCh

item.title: The suspected shooter of Charlie Kirk faces seven charges, including aggravated murder and witness tampering - Utah County Attorney Jeff Gray says he will seek the death penalty. #CharlieKirk #TylerRobinson #USNews #BBCNews
item.description: The suspected shooter of Charlie Kirk faces seven charges, including aggravated murder and witness tampering - Utah County Attorney Jeff Gray says he will seek the death penalty. #CharlieKirk #TylerRobinson #USNews #BBCNews
